alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Livingston; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN WYOMING... SOUTHWESTERN LIVINGSTON AND NORTHEASTERN ALLEGANY COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Portageville, or near Letchworth State Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dansville, Letchworth State Park, Portageville, Nunda, Castile, Ossian, Canaseraga, Hunt, Dalton, Ossian Center, Swain, and Rossburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 5. Interstate 86 near exit 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
